Whenever craving that hearty/ American style brunch, you should come here to satisfy your appetite. All the staples of brunch are here: eggs Benedict, pancakes, waffles, eggs any way you want with home fries, and of course mimosas. Try making reservations ahead especially if you are a large group. It has about 8 tables inside and gets full quickly. Atmosphere is cool and relaxing, food is delicious, service is ok, sometimes a wait is too long. They have a sister restaurant "Marmalade" with outside seating and identical menu, located in Raval.
